summary: Tough cop Dave Bannion takes on a politically powerful crime syndicate.
cast: Glenn Ford|Gloria Grahame|Jocelyn Brando|Alexander Scourby|Lee Marvin|Jeanette Nolan|Peter Whitney|Willis Bouchey|Robert Burton|Adam Williams|Howard Wendell|Chris Alcaide|Michael Granger|Dorothy Green|Carolyn Jones|Ric Roman|Dan Seymour|Edith Evanson|Phil Arnold|Linda Bennett|Charles Cane|Phil Chambers|John Close|Sidney Clute|John Crawford|John Doucette|Kathryn Eames|Al Eben|Douglas Evans|Fritz Ford|Jimmy Gray|Michael Jeffers|Byron Kane|Donald Kerr|Lyle Latell|Harry Lauter|Nico Lek|Celia Lovsky|Herbert Lytton|Mike Mahoney|Laura Mason|Paul Maxey|Joseph Mell|John Merton|Patrick Miller|William Murphy|Ezelle Poule|Norma Randall|Michael Ross|Ted Stanhope|Robert Stevenson|William Vedder
title: Los sobornados
